subSections.title: Han character
subSections.text:
{{Han char|rn=30|rad=口|as=05|sn=8|four=|canj=RHA|ids=⿰口白}}

# (corrupted form of [[咟]]) to [[call]], to [[yell]]
# [[anxious]]
# [[dazed]]
# [[image]] [[sound]], [[exclamation]] expressing sound (such as [[clapping]] [[hand]]s, [[firing]] a [[gun]], to [[strike]] or the sound of a [[firecracker]])
